Developer Terms of Use
des:
For MESHLE-enabled devices, you can now use Alexa to conveniently control lights, switches and shutters by voice. This Skill requires the Smart Home solution powered by MESHLE, which includes all devices with the "Works with MESHLE" compatibility logo. Currently, luminaires (RGBW, RGB, Tunable white and dimmer), switches, sockets and shutters are supported. You would need to log in to the MESHLE Cloud to use this skill function.
 
Once the skill is activated, you will be prompted to link your MESHLE Cloud account with Alexa. To do this, enter your MESHLE Cloud access data and click Login. If you are not yet registered in the MESHLE Cloud, please register in the MESHLE App first.

With this skill, you have the option of controlling all MESHLE-capable devices individually:

Lights (RGBW/RGB)
- "All lights in the kitchen 100%" 
- "Set lights in the living room to blue"

Lights (Tunable White)
- "Set kitchen light to warm"
- "Set lights in bathroom to cold"

Lights (Dimmer)
- "Turn on the light in the hall"
- "Set light in the hall to 20%"

Switches and Plugs 
- "Turn on the ventilator" (The device name must be "ventilator" in this case)
- "Turn off the floor lamp" (the device name must be "floor lamp" in this case

Shutter / Garage
- "Open shutter in the living room" 
- "Close garage door" 

By questions and feedback please contact support@meshle.com
Your MESHLE Team
